charges.charge_description: 18:1029(a)(2), 1029(c)(1) and 3551 et seq. CREDIT CARD FRAUD (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Deft pleaded guilty to count one of a two count indictment.Count two is dismissed on motion of USA.Deft shall pay a special assessment of $50.00 due immediately.Deft to be imprisoned for a term of six (6) months.Execution of sentence is stayed until 7/15/93.Deft shall surrender to US MArshal at 1:00 P.M. on 7/15/93.Deft shall be on supervised release for a term of three (3) years. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:1708 and 3551 et seq. LARCENY &; THEFT, POSTAL (2)

charges.charge_disposition: On govt's motion remaining count 2 of indictment is dismissed. (2)

charges.charge_description: 18 USC 1029(a)(2) and 1029 (c)(1)-Use of unauthorized access devices with intent to defraud. [9:92-m-2074]

charges.charge_disposition: Order of dismissal without prejudice signed by Mag. Orenstein on 1/12/93. [9:92-m-2074] (-1)
